articles.description: Bill Cosby has requested not to have a radio or any audio to listen to proceedings Tuesday as lawyers argue for his sexual assault conviction to be overturned.
articles.content: Bill Cosby 'never had a fair shot' in a trial that 'laid waste to the presumption of innocence,' by allowing five prior 'victims' to testify and using the actor's own words given on the promise of im… [+10473 chars]
